# parts

**Instance Property**

A mutable collection of parts.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var parts: LowLevelMesh.PartsCollection { get set }
```

## Discussion

The parts of a [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/LowLevelMesh] object specify how to interpret the index buffer. You can also use `parts` to customize the material index and primitive type.

## Describing a low-level mesh

- **descriptor**: The definition of the structure of this low-level mesh.
- **indexCapacity**: The capacity of the index buffer, measured in indices.
- **vertexCapacity**: The capacity of the vertex buffer, measured in vertices.
